title: All About Foxes
description: All About Foxes introduces students to a fantastic, furry species. The text identifies foxes as mammals, describes their physical appearance, and notes their hunting abilities. Detailed photographs enhance the information provided by the text. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and details as well as the proper use of pronouns in sentences.

awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /o/ sound
